column4: Hi, I'm just trying to install Ubuntu 704 with dualboot for WinXP. I have some problems I dont know what to do about. If anyone please can check here: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/31109/ and tell me what I'm doing wrong ?
I don't know what the problem is, but is there any reason you cannot just leave it with sda first in the boot sequence?
Sorry, I misread it - I thought it said "grub boots OK"
If you saw the link, the reason for not having sda (the SCSI disk) the first in boot sequence, is that then Windows XP loads, and I cant enter ubuntu
